sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Hi ${event.group.owner},

I hope you are getting excited about your Meetup! 

Here are a few things to keep in mind before your event:

  • Make sure to record all of the event attendees in the Developer app.
  • If you can, try to take pictures from the event, that way you can post them to your Meetup.com chapter page.
  • When you request a reimbursement, please provide a detailed receipt and keep your expenses below $15/person per Meetup up to $500/quarter for your events. You can request a reimbursement through the attendance app. 

Please let me know if you need anything from my end in the meantime and thank you for your efforts as an organizer!

Best,

Tanvi Gokhale

Platform Product Marketing Co-op

servicenow
sysevent_email_template.name: Meetup Approaching
sysevent_email_template.subject: Your ServiceNow Developer Meetup is in Two Days!
